page.title: 04Farmland in Brookmans Park
page.content: We visited a typical farm in the area. There were 200 acres of oats, wheat and barley used mainly for cattle feed and 100 acres arable land. There are 150 Friesian cows and a Blonde Aquitaine bull.The farm is worked by two adults and a boy.There are 4 tractors,a combine harvester,a baler and a slurry tank. Mr Morgan, the farmer, has been farming here for forty years and complains that even though he uses his land to the full he finds it difficult to make a reasonable profit. In this last year he made Â£4000 less than the previous year. From one cow he gets about 150 litres of milk per week which is about 50 000 pints from all the cows.
